entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 11:56 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
